name: Ogre, Black Sun
description: A large ogre with infernal tattoos, showcasing a powerful physique and a malicious demeanor.
memorable: The ogre's ability to deal necrotic damage alongside its exceptional melee capabilities makes it a unique threat.
goals: Typically seeks to dominate weaker creatures and expand its influence through intimidation and brute force.
relations: Could command lesser undead or work alongside other evil creatures.
environment: Often found in dark caverns or areas under the influence of sinister powers.
strengths: High armor class and hit points enhance its durability, while magical enhancements increase its offensive capabilities.
weaknesses: Relying primarily on physical attacks may leave it vulnerable to ranged or magic-based foes.
attacks: Uses melee attacks with a greatsword, dealing both slashing and necrotic damage.
most_powerful_ability: Dark Word attacks up to two targets, dealing significant necrotic damage if they fail their saving throws.
senses: Possesses darkvision up to 60 feet, allowing it to see in dim light as if it were bright light.
skills: Has a passive perception of 14, indicating decent awareness of its surroundings.
additional_information: Benefits from the Infernal Runes ability, granting it a bonus to AC and advantage on saves against magic.
Possesses the Unholy Blade ability, enhancing its weapon attacks with additional necrotic damage.
Multiattack capability allows it to strike multiple times in a single turn.
Can knock prone attackers who miss with melee attacks through its reaction ability.
Its lawful evil nature suggests strategic and brutal tactics in combat.
test_queries: ogre that deals extra damage in combat
ogre proficient in brutal melee attacks
creature with infernal tattoos and dark magic
